title: What are some bad writing prompts? - Quora

response.answer_text: Bad writing prompts are general: how do you feel? What is the world coming to? Good writing prompts are specific, how do the clouds feel? Why did you choose that color nail polish? The specific leads to more personal responses and as you continue to explore the specific, you will uncover a greater truth.
Things that your writers will struggle writing about. For example: if you writers are younger, asking about things like retirement would be a bad writers prompt because they know nothing about it.
